CustomField.description: This field only exists for the FSL Mobile app and the Work Order overview screen - you can only have a limited number of fields displayed, hence this field that consists of 3 fields.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field only exists for the FSL Mobile app and the Work Order overview screen - you can only have a limited number of fields displayed, hence this field that consists of 3 fields.
CustomField.label: ServiceApptStatus WO Number + RecordType
